oai_dc:dc.dc:title: MSTperl delexicalized parser transfer scripts and configuration files
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Rosa, Rudolf
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: parsing
delexicalized parser transfer
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This is a set of MSTperl parser configuration files and scripts for delexicalized parser transfer. They were used in the work reported in arXiv:1506.04897 (http://arxiv.org/abs/1506.04897), as well as several related papers. The MSTperl parser is available at http://hdl.handle.net/11234/1-1480
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Charles University, Faculty of Mathematics and Physics, Institute of Formal and Applied Linguistics (UFAL)
